description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical

full table condition- three cups over the whole length of the table. Left and right cups stood next to the edge of the table and the middle cup occupied the position in the middle of the table/ half table condition- food hidden in one of three cups near each other after 30 seconds they retrieve
place where was the reward was -left/right/ middle
whether participant choice was – left/right/ middle
whether participant choice was correct - correct/incorrect
